name: Lonely Swamp
description:
Phil is a poison dart frog. His wish to dash around quickly was granted but with a twist: in order to do so he must become a lifeless dart.  One day while in this state, the entire swamp around him was overrun by a fungus that destroyed all other life, but Phil the dart was safe.

When he returned to the realm of the living, he saw what had become of his home. Fragile and alone he must escape the infested swamp before meeting the same fate as his friends.  But a voice sounds in his head, telling him to "bring amulets".  Could their magic undo the damage?

Move around with the arrow keys, and hop and dash with Z/X/C/V to save yourself and the world around you! Reach the beacon at the end and experience one of three endings depending on how you played!
